# Extensioninfo

Package| [flash.external](package-detail.html)  
---|---  
Class| public final class ExtensionInfo  
Inheritance| ExtensionInfo ![Inheritance](../../images/inherit-arrow.gif) [Object](../../Object.html)  
  
**Language version:**|  ActionScript 3.0   
---|---  
**Runtime version:**|  AIR 50.0   
---|---  
  
The ExtensionInfo class provides details about a particular AIR Native Extension. 

See also

[flash.external.ExtensionContext](../external/ExtensionContext.html)
